articles.author: Benjamin Gubana
articles.title: Perth COVID lockdown update: No new cases of community spread - ABC News
articles.description: Western Australia records no new cases of COVID-19 in the community, as the Perth and Peel lockdown continues for a second day.
articles.content:
Western Australia has recorded no new community cases of COVID-19 amid a growing outbreak of the virus in Perth. Key points:
  • No new locally-acquired cases were reported this morning

articles.title: Clarice Beckett: Australian artist's place in global art history cemented in exhibition - ABC News
